text:
- The Very Group are the
UK's largest pure play
online digital retailer.
We partnered AWS to supercharge
our understanding of the customer,

to make sure that we
take the customer data

that we know about them
and offer really, you know,

relevant, timely,
personalized experiences.

AWS plays a massive role in the
end-to-end data environment,
data platforms and AI platforms.

So everything from storing
our data, building warehouses,

right through to using AI
to better predict patterns,
stock, pricing, promotional effectiveness,

and even leveraging gen AI
to build new propositions.

The new services that
we're using from AWS,

we're doing an awful lot
with SageMaker and Bedrock.
Building on AWS really is the foundation
of customer understanding and innovation.
If you don't understand your customer,
you can't really innovate for them.
So and AWS with its, you know,
data and analytics capability

gives us that customer
understanding to innovate with.
(upbeat music)
